alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:30PM EST until February 04 at 10:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain, possibly mixed with sleet. Additional accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Little or no sleet accumulation. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will gradually fall to freezing early this evening with a period of light freezing rain. In addition, temperatures will continue to gradually fall through the night with areas of standing water refreezing and producing black ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
